name: nattery
description: Scalable microservices-based battery energy trading system

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @nattery/frontend dev" "yarn workspace @nattery/device-service dev" "yarn workspace @nattery/trading-service dev" "yarn workspace @nattery/analytics-service dev" "yarn workspace @nattery/user-service dev"
scripts.build:services: yarn workspace @nattery/device-service build && yarn workspace @nattery/trading-service build && yarn workspace @nattery/analytics-service build && yarn workspace @nattery/user-service build
scripts.reset: docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f && yarn clean && yarn install

author: Nattery Team
